update wx_public_prepay_bill
OPTIMISTIC = #{optimistic,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OUTER_TRADE_NO = #{outerTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREPAY_ID = #{prepayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSI_NO = #{busiNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSI_NOTIFY_URL = #{busiNotifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSI_SYNC_URL = #{busiSyncUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENID = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_INFO = #{deviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NONCE_STR = #{nonceStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BODY = #{body,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTACH = #{attach,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_TYPE = #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_FEE = #{totalFee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SPBILL_CREATE_IP = #{spbillCreateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_START = #{timeStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_EXPIRE = #{timeExpire,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_TAG = #{goodsTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_TYPE = #{tradeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIMIT_PAY = #{limitPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENE_INFO = #{sceneInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURN_CODE = #{returnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_URL = #{codeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
